TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed Versioned extends System.Object

summary.span: 模組會包含用於與物件、應用程式和系統互動的程序。

span.span: The module contains procedures used to interact with objects, applications, and systems.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個模組支援的 Visual Basic 語言關鍵字和執行階段程式庫成員，以執行其他程式、 呼叫方法或屬性，從電腦發出嗶、 提供命令列字串、 操作 COM 物件，並控制對話方塊。This module supports the Visual Basic language keywords and run-time library members that run other programs, call a method or property, sound a beep from the computer, provide a command-line string, manipulate COM objects, and control dialog boxes. 這個類別是 Visual Basic 2005 更新的版本的類別 （在 Visual Basic 2003 使用）。This class is the Visual Basic 2005 updated version of the class (which was used in Visual Basic 2003).

MemberSignature.Value: public static object CallByName (object Instance, string MethodName, Microsoft.VisualBasic.CallType UseCallType, params object[] Arguments);

param.span: 公開屬性或方法之物件的指標。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 包含物件之屬性或方法名稱的字串運算式。

span.span: A string expression containing the name of the property or method on the object.

param.name: UseCallType

span.span: Required.

param.span: 型別 的列舉型別成員，其表示正在呼叫的程序型別。

span.span: An enumeration member of type representing the type of procedure being called.
The value of can be , , or .

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 參數陣列，其中包含要傳遞給屬性或正在呼叫的方法之引數。

span.span: A parameter array containing the arguments to be passed to the property or method being called.

summary.span: 在物件上執行方法，或是設定或傳回物件上的屬性。

span.span: Executes a method on an object, or sets or returns a property on an object.

returns.span: 在物件上執行方法，或是設定或傳回物件上的屬性。

span.span: Executes a method on an object, or sets or returns a property on an object.
